function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited data on COVID-19 vaccination coverage by country of birth","Impact":"Underestimation of vaccination rates among migrant populations, leading to potential health disparities and higher transmission rates","Mitigation":"Developing legal basis for publishing data on administered vaccinations by country of birth, improving vaccination registers, and conducting comprehensive surveys","Technologies":"Vaccination registers, survey tools","People":"Migrant populations, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, government organizations"},{"Description":"Inequity in COVID-19 vaccination coverage between native-born and foreign-born individuals","Impact":"Higher risk of infections and serious symptoms among migrant populations, contributing to disease transmission and health disparities","Mitigation":"Implementing targeted vaccination outreach programs, addressing barriers to access, and promoting vaccine equity initiatives","Technologies":"Outreach communication tools, mobile vaccination clinics","People":"Migrant populations, healthcare providers, community organizations","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Non-adjustment for vaccinations administered abroad in register-based vaccination rates","Impact":"Overstatement of differences in vaccination rates between native-born and foreign-born populations, leading to inaccurate data interpretation and policy decisions","Mitigation":"Developing strategies to account for vaccinations administered abroad, improving data collection methods, and cross-referencing vaccination records","Technologies":"Data management systems, cross-referencing algorithms","People":"Epidemiologists, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"}]}
